title: Valuble land for Sale in Kandana
details:
Highly Residential Very Safe Peacefully 22.5 pr land for sale at Batagama South, Kandana.
1km to Rilaulla Junction
1.2 km to K Zone Shoping Mall
1.5km to Kandana Town
1.3km to Seventh Day School
800m To De Mazoned College
700m To Kandana Railway Station
2km to Ja ela High Way Entrance.
17.8 km to Colombo
All Facilities Are Available.
🎈Tap Line
🎈Electricity
